name: @percy/core
description: the core component of percy's cli and sdks that handles creating builds, discovering snapshot assets, uploading snapshots, and finalizing builds. uses `@percy/client` for api communication, a chromium browser for asset discovery, and starts a local api se
kwds: the core component of percy's cli and sdks that handles creating builds, discovering snapshot assets, uploading snapshots, and finalizing builds. uses `@percy/client` for api communication, a chromium browser for asset discovery, and starts a local api se
